name: Electroweb
description: You unleash an electric net of web upon a creature. Make a ranged attack roll, dealing 1d8 + MOVE electric damage on a hit, and reducing the target's speed by 5 feet. The target can use an action on its turn remove any web from its body. A target whose speed is reduced to 0 is restrained.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
